name: Megacraft Hentai Survival
description:
Megacraft Hentai Survival is an open-world shooter where there is no specific goal, no linear plot, but there is a large colorful cubic world, a resource collection system, a character who needs water and food, a variety of weapons and of course zombies. A lot of angry and hungry zombies, where without them!?

Somewhere here are hidden ten drawings of beautiful girls, find them to complete the game.

Main Features

  • Huge open location
  • Shooting
  • Edged weapons
  • Search for resources
  • Crafting
  • Building system
  • Driving a car
  • Cooking food
  • Zombies! Hentai drawings!
  • And much more!
